item.title: Dragon Claw Special 1 Error! :'(
item.dc:creator: @99_mager1 99 mager
item.description:
@99_mager1 wrote:

Hello, I’ve been trying to add a dragon claw special for about a week now… I had 4 errors, now I have 1.
Heres my code :

if(j == 3995){
int file = 1686;
if(FrameStart[file] < 1)
Class36.methodCustomAnimations(false, file);
int[] frames = {75,62,93,82,57,71,66,61,92,73,65,89,70,81,67,84,5 9,63,99,78,69,74,79,90,94,58,0};
aClass20Array351[j].anInt352 = frames.length-1;
aClass20Array351[j].anIntArray353 = new int[frames.length-1];
aClass20Array351[j].anIntArray354 = new int[frames.length-1];
aClass20Array351[j].anIntArray355 = new int[frames.length-1];
for(int i2 = 0; i2 < frames.length-1; i2++){
aClass20Array351[j].anIntArray353[i2] = frames[i2]FrameStart;
aClass20Array351[j].anIntArray354[i2] = -1;
}
}

And i have this error :

Class20.java:1127: ‘;’ expected
aClass20Array351[j].anIntArray353[i2] = frames[i]FrameStart;
^
1 error
Finished!
Press any key to continue . . .
